name: World Summit on Neuroscience and Nervous System Disorders (
content: About WSNNSD2024 It is a great pleasure for us to invite you all to participate as speaker, delegate, sponsor and/or as exhibitor at the World Summit on Neuroscience and Nervous System Disorders (WSNNSD2024), which will be held in Nice, France during September 16-18, 2024\. Scheduled to take place from September 16-18, 2024 in the beautiful city of Nice, our summit aims to bring together the leading experts in the field of neurosciece. This international platform will provide an exceptional opportunity to exchange knowledge, foster collaborations, and explore innovative solutions that address the pressing challenges facing our world today. We believe worldwide doctors, scientists, academicians, government institutions, students, scholars, entrepreneurs in the fields will create huge opportunities by showcasing the growth and breakthrough of neuroscience at a time when so many new innovations and challenges are available.
